section.name: About OpenDJ Directory Server
section.p: OpenDJ is an LDAPv3 compliant directory service, developed for the Java platform, providing a high performance, highly available, and secure store for the identities managed by your organization. Its easy installation process, combined with the power of the Java platform makes OpenDJ the simplest, fastest directory to deploy and manage.

section.name: Get the OpenDJ Directory Server
section.p: You can obtain the OpenDJ Directory Server using any of the following methods:

subsection.name: Download
subsection.p: By far the simplest method is to download it directly from the ForgeRock Maven repository or from the ForgeRock download page.

subsection.name: Build
subsection.p: For the DIY enthusiasts you can build it yourself by checking out the latest code using Subversion and building it with Ant or Maven 3.

section.name: Getting started
section.p: Once you have obtained a copy of the OpenDJ Directory Server, read the Installation Guide for further instructions.
